com.opensource.bitmapfun.util

类 ImageWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageWorker
  • 直接已知子类:
    ImageResizer

    public abstract class ImageWorker
extends Object
    This class wraps up completing some arbitrary long running work when loading a bitmap to an
    ImageView. It handles things like using a memory and disk cache, running the work in a background
    thread and setting a placeholder image.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  ImageWorker.ImageWorkerAdapter
      A very simple adapter for use with ImageWorker class and subclasses.
      static interface  ImageWorker.LoadListener

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(Object data,
             ImageView imageView,
             ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        已过时。 This method can be ambiguous to loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config) when
        the third parameter is null.Use loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config, LoadListener)
        instead.
        Load an image specified by the data parameter into an ImageView (override

        ImageWorker#processBitmap(Object) to define the processing logic). A memory and disk
        cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using
        setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is found in the memory cache, it
        is set immediately, otherwise an AsyncTask will be created to asynchronously load the
        bitmap.

        参数:
        data - The URL of the image to download.
        isNative - The data is native or not, true is native, false is Internet.
        imageView - The ImageView to bind the downloaded image to.
        另请参阅:
        #loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config, LoadListener)}

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(Object data,
             ImageView imageView)
        Load an image specified by the data parameter into an ImageView (override ImageWorker#processBitmap(Object) to define the processing logic). A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is found in the memory cache, it is set immediately, otherwise an AsyncTask will be created to asynchronously load the bitmap.
        参数:
        data - The URL of the image to download.
        isNative - The data is native or not, true is native, false is Internet.
        imageView - The ImageView to bind the downloaded image to.

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(int num,
             ImageView imageView)
        Load an image specified from a set adapter into an ImageView (override ImageWorker#processBitmap(Object) to define the processing logic). A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is found in the memory cache, it is set immediately, otherwise an AsyncTask will be created to asynchronously load the bitmap. setAdapter(ImageWorkerAdapter) must be called before using this method.
        参数:
        num - The URL index of the image to download.
        imageView - The ImageView to bind the downloaded image to.

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(Object data,
             ImageView imageView,
             Bitmap.Config config,
             ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        Load an image specified by the data parameter. A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is not found in the memory or disk cache, it would load from file.
        参数:
        data -
        imageView -
        config -

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(Object data,
             ImageView imageView,
             Bitmap.Config config)
        已过时。 This method can be ambiguous to loadImage(Object, ImageView, LoadListener) when
        the third parameter is null.Use loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config, LoadListener)
        instead.
        Load an image specified by the data parameter. A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using
        setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is not found in the memory or disk cache,
        it would load from file.
        参数:
        data -
        imageView -
        config -
        另请参阅:
        #loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config, LoadListener)}

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(int num,
             ImageView imageView,
             ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        Load an image specified from a set adapter into an ImageView (override ImageWorker#processBitmap(Object) to define the processing logic). A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is found in the memory cache, it is set immediately, otherwise an AsyncTask will be created to asynchronously load the bitmap. setAdapter(ImageWorkerAdapter) must be called before using this method.
        参数:
        num - The URL index of the image to download.
        imageView - The ImageView to bind the downloaded image to.

      • getImageBitmap

        public Bitmap getImageBitmap(Object data,
                    Bitmap.Config config,
                    ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        Load an image specified by the data parameter. A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is not found in the memory or disk cache, it would load from file.
        参数:
        data - The URL of the image to download.
        config - The config of bitmap
        l - Loading progress call back,only for download bitmap.
        返回:
        the bitmap

      • getImageBitmap

        public Bitmap getImageBitmap(Object data,
                    Bitmap.Config config)
        Load an image specified by the data parameter. A memory and disk cache will be used if an ImageCache has been set using setImageCache(ImageCache). If the image is not found in the memory or disk cache, it would load from file.
        参数:
        data - The URL of the image to download.
        config - The config of bitmap
        返回:
        the bitmap

      • cancelWork

        public static void cancelWork(ImageView imageView)

      • cancelPotentialWork

        public static boolean cancelPotentialWork(Object data,
                          ImageView imageView)
        Returns true if the current work has been canceled or if there was no work in progress on this image view. Returns false if the work in progress deals with the same data. The work is not stopped in that case.
